description:
Arm sponsored my trip to CES 2024, and I found TONS of exciting power-efficient tech that runs #onArm. From wearables, to smart devices, cars as well as powerful cloud data centers.

Some of the companies and products I mentioned in this video:

  - Automotive Grade Linux: https://www.automotivelinux.org
  - Green Hills Software: https://ghs.com
  - AWS Automotive: https://aws.amazon.com/automotive/
  - SOAFEE: https://www.soafee.io
  - Ubuntu Core: https://ubuntu.com/core
  - Himax WiseEye 2: https://www.himax.com.tw/products/intelligent-sensing/always-on-smart-sensing/wiseeye2-ai-processor/
  - Seeed Studios Grove Vision AI Module V2: https://wiki.seeedstudio.com/grove_vision_ai_v2/
  - Exeger Powerfoyle: https://www.exeger.com/powerfoyle/
  - Arm big.LITTLE architecture: https://www.arm.com/technologies/big-little

Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/geerlingguy
Sponsor me on GitHub: https://github.com/sponsors/geerlingguy
Merch: https://redshirtjeff.com
2nd Cha
title: CES Tech for next-gen performance and power efficiency
